title: Typeface recommendations for business cards?
content:
Hello all. I'm looking for suggestions for really sharp, professional looking typefaces for business cards. I'm using a PC, not MAC.   
   
Thanks.
author: jroden144

comments.content: J -- First you start out with the text of the card, then you sketch out possibilities either by hand or by computer printout on approximations of various card stock. The typeface will suggest itself if you work at it long and hard enough. That is, if you really study each face for the characteristics that will make your solution succeed.
